migration_note: This structure supports both old scripts (via 'recommendations') and new series-based system (via 'series')

recommendations._comment: Legacy format for backward compatibility - kept for scripts that haven't been updated yet
recommendations.ai_tools: Specific AI tool demonstrations with visual transformations (Midjourney, ChatGPT, Notion AI, Canva AI)
recommendations.productivity: ChatGPT prompts, workflow automation, time-saving techniques with measurable results
recommendations.trending: ONLY trending AI news with clear practical impact - filter out controversies and failures

examples: Tool Teardown Tuesday - Episode 5: Midjourney's SECRET Parameter Creates Perfect Images!
Tool Teardown Tuesday - Episode 6: Notion AI's HIDDEN Feature Builds Workflows in 60 Seconds!

content_requirements.hook_structure: Show the END RESULT in first 3 seconds, then explain how

high_priority: ChatGPT advanced features (Code Interpreter, Vision, DALL-E integration)
proven_performers: Canva secret AI features (114 views, 70% completion)
exclude: Tools requiring paid subscriptions without free tier
Generic 'AI tool' without naming specific product
Tools with complex setup (over 5 minutes to start)

hook_examples: Midjourney just leaked a parameter that creates PERFECT faces
This Notion AI trick builds your entire workflow in 60 seconds
Canva's hidden AI feature designs better than professional designers
bullet_structure: Bullet 1: What the secret feature is + why most people miss it
Bullet 2: Exactly how to access it (step-by-step, under 15 words)
Bullet 3: What changes for the viewer (measurable benefit)
script_guidance.cta_template: Next Tuesday (Episode [N+1]): I'm testing [NEXT_TOOL]'s [FEATURE]. Subscribe so you don't miss it!

title_formula.template: ChatGPT SECRET Prompts - Episode [N]: [SPECIFIC USE CASE]!
examples: SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 3: Email Mastery in SECONDS!
SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 4: Meeting Notes AUTOMATION!
SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 5: Content Creation SUPERCHARGED!

must_include: Episode number in title AND hook
content_requirements.hook_structure: Episode [N] solves [SPECIFIC PROBLEM] that [AUDIENCE] faces daily

exclude: Generic 'be more creative' prompts without specifics
Prompts requiring paid ChatGPT Plus features (unless clearly disclosed)

hook_examples: Episode 5: This ChatGPT prompt writes YOUR emails in 10 seconds
Episode 6: SECRET prompt turns 1-hour meetings into 2-minute summaries
Episode 7: I found the ULTIMATE content creation prompt
bullet_structure: Bullet 1: Show the exact prompt (readable text on screen)
Bullet 3: When to use it (specific daily scenario)
script_guidance.cta_template: Episode [N+1] next Thursday: The [USE_CASE] prompt that [BENEFIT]. Hit subscribe or you'll miss it!

examples: Google's Gemini 2.0 Flash: YOUR Search Just Got 10x Smarter!
OpenAI's GPT-5 Leak: Changes EVERYTHING About AI Coding!
Samsung's Secret VR Headset: Transforms YOUR Daily Workflow!

must_include: Personal impact angle (how it affects viewer TODAY)
content_requirements.hook_structure: What changed + why it matters to YOU specifically

include: Major AI model releases (GPT, Gemini, Claude updates)
New features in existing popular tools
Game-changing AI breakthroughs with immediate applications
Industry shifts that affect daily tool usage
proven_low_performers_to_avoid: Security hacks without resolution (HACKED: low engagement)
Vague trends without specific tools (Google Maps: 38.8%)
quality_filter: ONLY news with clear 'how this affects you' angle
MUST relate to tools viewers actually use
AVOID pure announcements without impact explanation

hook_examples: Google just made YOUR searches 10x more accurate with Gemini 2.0
OpenAI's new GPT-5 writes code like a senior developer
This Samsung VR leak changes how YOU work from home
bullet_structure: Bullet 1: What's new (specific feature or change)
Bullet 3: What you can do with it TODAY (immediate action)
script_guidance.cta_template: Tuesday's Tool Teardown: I'm testing [RELATED_TOOL]. Follow so you don't miss it!

weekly_breakdown.tool_demos: 2 per week (Tuesday + occasional Saturday if news is weak)
weekly_breakdown.curated_news: 0-1 per week (Saturday, only if passes quality gates)

reasoning.tool_demos_priority: Your Text-to-3D video got 461.7% rewatch - this is your STRENGTH
reasoning.prompt_libraries_value: ChatGPT Email Prompts got 380 views - SECRET formula works
reasoning.news_caution: Microsoft FAILED got 31.8% completion - news is RISKY, filter heavily

best_performers.title: Text to 3D Models: This AI Tool Changes Design FOREVER!
best_performers.why_it_worked: Visual transformation, specific tool, rewatch-worthy demo

best_performers.title: ChatGPT's SECRET Email Prompts: Write Perfect Emails in SECONDS!
best_performers.why_it_worked: SECRET hook, specific use case, time benefit quantified
